cast.overview: When 11-year-old Riley moves to a new city, her Emotions team up to help her through the transition. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness work together, but when Joy and Sadness get lost, they must journey through unfamiliar places to get back home.
cast.title: Inside Out

details.biography:
Peter Daniel Sagal (born January 31, 1965)[2]is an American humorist, writer, and host of the National Public Radio game show Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me! and the PBS special Constitution USA with Peter Sagal.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Peter Sagal, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Peter Sagal
